name: WyndBlast NFT
description:
WyndBlast is a play-to-earn multiplayer game built on avalanche. There
are various in-game activities, including breeding, recruiting, forging,
PVE & PVP. We introduce three kinds of digital assets (The wynd, The
rider, and the equipment). That is Because wyndblast is the first game
we will build around Chronica Sola Verse. After WyndBlast has
successfully stable and matured, we will introduce another 'verse' or
play, and the player can use the same asset used in WyndBlast. That is
why we need to ensure that the digital assets available are varied
enough to fulfill this goal. The critical difference between WyndBlast
and a traditional game is that Blockchain economic design unlocks the
ability to have complex player-owned economies and reward players who
can reach advanced skill levels. Players can have fun and work towards
ambitious goals while simultaneously earning potential resources that
will have real monetary value due to an open economic system and demand
from other players - "Play-and-Earn."
